lines.text: I'll be your "amigo" for free.
An "amigo" I can use right now.
You don't like me in the day time?
Not in front of all of these people.

[on the phone]
Tropicana, por favor?
Are you sure you're not a 40 year old midget?
Blood is thicker than tequila. I find another nobody to build into a somebody.
Don't worry, Raoul. I'm not leaving here yet. I've got something to do first.
Buenos noches.
And good evening to you too Señorita.
You're not leaving already.
Join us for a drink?
Thank you but I have to get home.
It's too hot and cold in here.
[first lines]
Hold it down. Everyone's asleep. Siesta.
It's too early for siesta.

[singing]
Viva el vino, viva el dinero / Viva, Viva, el amor.

[singing]
Mexico, Mexico / They've got muchas, mu-cha-chas, amigos.

[singing]
Senoritas

[singing]
Never saw such adorable creatures.

[singing]
Who makes me tremble with wonderful rapture / With one burning glance, from her eyes / Marguerita...

[singing]
I said, "Take it easy, baby / I worked all day and my feet feel just like lead / You got my shirt tail flyin' all over the place and the sweat poppin' out of my head" / She said, "Hey, Bossa nova, baby, Keep on a workin' for this ain't no time to quit" / She said, "Go, Bossa nova, baby, keep on dancin' I'm about to have myself a fit" / Bossa nova, Bossa nova.

[singing]
You can't say no, in Acapulco / Where romance blooms, and love is in the air / So kiss me tender, love me true / Darling feel this magic too / Don't say no, you can't say no, in Acapulco. / Don't say no, you can't say no, in Acapulco.
Oh, it must be a very important mission that sends you off in such a hurry.
If you must know I'm on the way to La Perla to see your girl.
What a coincidence. I'm going there, too, to make a beautiful dive for your North American astronaut. We can share a taxi.
Thanks, but no, thanks.
The chicken wants to get to the other side of the road.
You better move.
Why don't you move me.
[last lines]

[singing]
Ay colomitos i nol vidables, i nol vidables como las tardes / En que la lluvia, des de la loma, ir nos hacia, hasta Zapopam / Guadalajara, Guadalajara, Guadalajara, Guadalajara / Guadalajara, Guadalajara.
Don't you think Mike was good?
In which performance?
Why do you leave so soon? We just start to have fun.
It's time for a working girl to be in bed.
Is there any special time?
What are you doing here this isn't a malt or a hamburger joint? And that better be Coca - Cola you're drinking or your dad is gonna go through the roof!
